Parameters: int: The id of the gesture that was detected. For example, @B_android#accessibilityservice#FingerprintGestureController#FINGERPRINT_GESTURE_SWIPE_RIGHT_E@.
onGestureDetected(int).Description: Called when the fingerprint sensor detects gestures.

Parameters: boolean: Whether or not the sensor's gesture detection is now available.
onGestureDetectionAvailabilityChanged(bo.Description: Called when the fingerprint sensor's gesture detection becomes available or unavailable.

ClassDesc: Class that is called back when fingerprint gestures are being used for accessibility.
